OakCrafted in Raw Oak

Carefully crafted from raw Oak, taken from fully sustainable and responsible sources, it has been beautifully designed to ensure the natural characteristics of the materials, including the smooth surfaces and visible wood grains, are a prominent and unique feature. name: Daisy Hardcastle  Our large robust and sturdy preserving pan
description:
Kit yourself out for a lifetime of preserving. Our large robust and sturdy preserving pan is an invaluable accessory for any jam maker. This Maslin pan has been designed to make homemade jam, preserves and chutneys the traditional way for those who cook in large quantities. Its wise diameter top helps rapidly evaporate excess liquid without boiling over.
Crafted from stainless steel this preserving pan has a capacity of approximately 8 litres, a 30.5cm diameter top and a height of 13cm. For best results we recommend you use on a low to medium heat to prevent the base from burning. Crafted from Stainless steel
Capacity of approximately 8 litres
30.5cm dia x H13cm
Handwash only
Suitable for use on all cookers, except induction hobs

The Maslin pan can also be used for extracting juice from fruit when making home-made wine and for reducing sauces. Our FSC solid beech wood preserving spoon has been designed with a flat edge making it ideal for scraping the bottom of your preserving pan, and getting into all the corners ensuring you get every last bit of your home-made jam, preserves and chutney.
 
It also comes with a handy hanging hook which fits on to the side of the pan to stop it slipping.Hook for hanging onto pan side
Flat edge for scraping
FSC solid beech – 100% pure, from well managed forests.
Handwash only, wipe clean

name: Daisy Hardcastle  Lighting
description:
Start an industrial revolution with our stylishly tough Cheyne Wall light.
 
Our contemporary wall light, with its refined edges and engineered style, forces its robust design into any living space. With its versatile build and durable features you are able to create perfectly focused lighting without losing any valuable space.
 
This strong, adaptable wall lamp can be seen taking center stage on any wall, lighting the way in a perfectly formed row, or found uninterrupted, singly lighting up a kitchen, hidden alcove or living room.
 
For ambient multi directional lighting throughout the home indulge in a stylish collection of interior wall lights, you’ll find you can never have too many of these slight home additions.
 
Constructed from powder-coated steel, our industrialisation ensures an added toughness, rendering it a durable and hardwearing product, guaranteed to provide light and style for years to come.
  
Our Cheyne wall lamp is finished in Chalk; its naturally based hue complements any decoration style, making it a perfect partner to any space.
 
We’ve perfectly balanced its hard exterior with uncompromised style and attraction, with an on/off switch, simply wire in and admire its focused illuminations.rafted in Powder Coated Steel
Wall Fixings Supplied
On/Off Switch on the base plate
Requires E14 28-35W or low energy equivalent bulb
CE Approved
H5 x W23 x D17cmThe first important consideration is to understand that their aesthetic is often more important than their actual function. Shape, size, colour and texture, important ingredients in any lighting, suddenly become even more so, the moment they are dangled from a ceiling. It’s very easy to find yourself in the ‘over-designed’ category with pendants, and our advice is to stick to classical shapes, avoid too much shine and never hit the ‘oversize’ button on a whim!

name: Daisy Hardcastle Dogy Tag
description:
This bone shape dog tag was cut from 18 gauge aluminum and stamped by hand with the name of a local neighborhood dog Charlie, however you can personalize your dog tog with any names, telephones numbers, or text. The tag measures about 1.5 inches long by .5 inch wide along the bone shaft. For a classy appearance and safety of your dog, the edges have been filed smooth and surfaces polished to a satin finish. A black patina was brushed deep into the letter for easy legibility against the soft silver glow.

The 5052 series aluminum has excellent resistance to corrosion and a high fatigue strength making this an ideal tag for a very active dog. By using a patina to darken the text, we provide you with a tag that can survive a long walk in a nasty downpour or that sudden roll in the mud. To personalize your tag simply enter your choice of engravings and text in the notes to seller section during check outThis dog tag was sawed by hand from 18 gauge aluminum using a jewelry saw and features an eye catching hand sawed paw cut out. You may personalized this dog tag with a dog's name, telephone numbers, dates, or any special words of your choosing by simply writing your text wishes under the notes to seller section during check out and I will happily stamp your tag for no additional charge. 

That paw cut out was produced by punching small holes in the aluminum and feeding a fine saw blade through the holes in order to cut the paw shapes. The 18 gauge aluminum is very lightweight, strong, and will survive even the most abusive dog. I finished the tag, by filing and rounding the edges and hand burnished the surface with a wire brush for a classy modern brushed aluminum appearance. You have an amazing dog, so why not treat your dog to this stunning handmade dog tag that I 
sawed by hand with a jewelry saw from 18 gauge aluminum.

While this dog tag is sure to get a good wag, you can also order the tag as a key chain, pendant, or incorporated into a wrap bracelet. If you would like any personalized text stamped into the metal, simply write your wishes in the check out notes and I will happily stamp your tag for no additional charge.

The dog shape measures about 1 ½ long and was hand burnished to a radiant metallic glow with natural iridescence. Dog tags can also be custom ordered in bronze, copper, and sterling silver in any shape, size, or style of your choosing.

name: Daisy Hardcastle   examples of original paintings by Philip Wiseman.
description:
http://philipwiseman.co.uk    Price on Application
Born & educated in York with further education at York St Johns University & York University working now from own studio in York.

Philip is a painter of landscape and coastal scenes many of which convey an atmospheric content. In his travels around

his native North Yorkshire he portrays the surrounding countryside in what he describes as his “summer works”. Akin to these he also produces his “winter works”, which include mainly still-life and architectural subjects.

The medium he uses most frequently is oil paint but he also values the expressive quality of pastels particularly in his small landscape scenes. Watercolour and acrylics are also used  in his depictions of the surrounding countryside which include the Howardian hills and the Yorkshire Wolds. The Vale of York with its superb light quality is another area preferred by the artist as well as the North Yorkshire Moors with its rugged beauty.

To Philip the key ingredient of his work is to try and convey a mood to the observer in his images. He hopes you enjoy his work as much as he enjoys creating it.

name: Daisy Hardcastle Shine lanterns  shimmer in the twilight of every season
description:
Shine lanterns  shimmer in the twilight of every season, lighting up your garden in summer and your stylish Scandinavian interior at Christmas. All products are eco-friendly. The paper carries the FSC-logo, and is acid- and chlorine-free. The Vega-Fast ink is a Dutch developed printing ink based on vegetable oils. The plastic-looking bags are actually made from cornflour and are bio-degradable.

For those who like to dabble in DIY, Shine asks for a touch of creativity. Push the flaps inwards or outwards – whatever you like best – and simply choose the side you like most, because these lanterns are reversible! Once lit up, the inner side of the lantern becomes slightly transparent, giving it an enchanting look. 

Each Shine set contains 3 lanterns. The pop-out cards are size 31 cm x 15 cm. The lanterns are large enough to fit over most drinking glasses and jam jars.

The A5 format card can easily be folded into a round party light. It fits around a high glass (diam. max 5.5cm) with a tea-light inside. It is safe and easy - it burns for hours. 

One pack contains 7 lanterns of different designs.

During the long and dark winter months, peasant farmers in xviiith century Sweden turned their hands to furniture making in order to supplement their income. The long case clocks originate from Mora in central Sweden and have become extremely sought after. Their simple, almost naïve designs turn them into a style statement in any context.

name: Daisy Hardcastle  Letterpress Cards by Presse Dufour - British Romantic Poetry Card (Byron, Shelley
description:
The British Romantic poets believed in celebrating nature, and the individual. They had a particular disdain for modern technology. So I'd like to think letterpress printing their poems in today's world would have pleased them so. The card features the key second generation of British Romantic poets - Lord Byron, Percy Shelley and John Keats - with a poem from each encapsulated in a heart-shaped design.,

Heart Card: "Love's Philosophy" by Percy Bysshe Shelley (1792-1822) , "Bright Star" by John Keats (1795-1821), "She Walks in Beauty" by Lord Byron (1788-1824) encapsulated in a heart-shaped design. Printed in red on a pink 6x6-inch card, with a red envelope.

Rotary Phone Calling Cards: Set of 8, printed in black on natural white 3x2-inch cards.

Keats' "Bright Star": Printed in red and black on 3 1/2 x 2 inch bright white card with a red envelope.

name: York  Blinds and Curtains @Daisy Hardcastle 15 years see www.blindsandcurtains.bigcartel.com
description:
Blinds and Curtains   http://blindsandcurtains.bigcartel.com/
 Made to Measure Service 

We can make your curtains, blinds, cushions. They will all be beautifully made to a high standard. City and Guild Qualified 

Use our made to measure service email size required and we will give you a price with our fabric or yours the choice is yours Blinds start from 55.00 can be on a baton or track cleats and weights provided
free measuring service in York and free delivery in York Other Items

For tie backs, bed valances and other items please contact our bespoke service.

 

Types of Curtains

Please see below the different curtain headings we offer in our Made-to-Measure service. Our curtains are hand finished and we use good quality lining and interlining. They include weights and will arrive ready to hang with hooks supplied.


Pencil Pleat
Less formal look, made with 3 inch tape.Standard Lining

We use a high quality 100% ivory cotton lining.

Blackout Lining

Our Roman blinds and curtains can be lined with blackout lining to block out the light and help insulate against heat loss.



Triple or French Pleat
A smart three pleat heading, better for more formal rooms



Cottage Pleat
Looks pretty - made with 1 inch tape set 2 inches down to give a soft gather (very simple but effective).


Types of Blind




Roman Blinds
A traditional folding blind. When it is pulled up the folds of fabric are still visible. The blind will be supplied on a simple wooden baton, covered in same fabric as blind, with a cord and screw in eyes, plus a cleat hook and acorn.



Swedish Blinds
A very pretty Scandinavian look - you will need to chose two fabrics one to back the other. This blind is only suitable for reachable windows because you will need to help the blind roll up straight! Supplied on a simple wooden baton, covered with lining fabric, with cord, glass rings and screw in eyes, plus a cleat hook and acorn.

name: Daisy Hardcastle The Mulberry Home Imperial Collection Please email for samples and quotes
description: The Mulberry Home Imperial Collection is inspired by the finest traditions of English craftsmanship.  The patterns and textures of these fabrics are modeled upon the enduring beauty of decorative plasterwork, gilding, wood carving, brass casting and parquet.  Mingling these classic looks with the rich tonality of velvet, the crisp finery of linen and the delicate exuberance of embroidery, this collection offers traditional elegance with a casual modern touch.

name: Daisy Design Mulberry/heirloom-weaves
description:
HEIRLOOM

For Mulberry Home, heirloom also means a design heritage with patterns echoing an archival past and made with respect for craft tradition.  Exuberant hand finished embroideries stitched on to shimmering silks and pure linen confidently demonstrates the art of fine needlework.  A dazzling collection of upholstery velvets in opulent textures and two elegant prints has a palette ranging from rich vibrant colours to smart and stylish neutrals. The smart decorative weaves of the Heirloom Collection offer a wide variety of differing textures and designs.  Natural herringbone fabric with floral and medallion embroidery in muted colours of orange, magenta, blue and green.

Delivery/Installation
Finally your curtains are pressed, dressed and delivered. I can also arrange for your chosen window treatment to be installed by an experienced fitter.


Your own fabric
Soft furnishings can be hand crafted in your own fabric, with or without trimmings, all you need to do is submit measurements and I will quote within 7days. name: Finding Serendipity @Daisy Shimmering Plain Silks, including silk dupions, silk taffetas as well as
Daisy Hardcastle Finding Serendipity @The Royal collection with help from Jac and Rebecca
description:
In 2008 Designers Guild launched a new brand, The Royal Collection of Fabrics and Wallcoverings, on behalf of, and in collaboration with, the Royal Household, which is a series of collections inspired by the interiors of the Royal residences, including Buckingham Palace and Windsor Castle and the first licensing agreement of its kind.

The range is produced using the finest weavers, printers and specialist mills, whose expertise ensure a balance of remaining faithful to traditional weaving and printing ethos and the very latest in modern technology.

The first inaugural collection, Arundel, featured stunning textures as well as a sumptuous wallpaper collection drawing on a rich and refined colour palette. The second collection, Savigny, launched in September 2009, included a brand new collection of tie-backs and trimmings and a new softer colour palette, and a third collection, Campanula, followed in 2010 offering a sense of relaxed elegance with a strong botanical theme.
